name: Planet with a Cat
description:
Keep the planet alive by planting down trees in the middle of a meteor shower! Not to mention that you have to keep yourself alive too as the last cat of this planet.

Planet with a cat is a simple arcade survival  game. It was made for the Ludum Dare 46 with a theme of Keep it Alive.

Just play and enjoy the game :)

Controls : A/D to Move And Plant, F to Toggle Fulscreen

Makers : BunggoGames (Developer), Fronix_uwu (Arts)

Used Assets : Blippy Trance music from Incompetech

Bug Fix : 

-The timer now works correctly

-The meteors won't spawn in a ridiculous rate anymore
